title: AUERVO Sewing Kit, Mini Sewing Kits 87PCS Thread and Needles Set for Adults, DIY,Home, Travel & Emergency with Compact Small Black Zipper Case
features: 【ALL Your Needs】 This mini sewing kit contains all of the essential tools you’ll need to get any quick mending done, needles made in Japan, scissors made of stainless steel, sewing thread is made of 100% polyester, shirt buttons, safety pins and more, the thread is super strong and will do not break easy, Totals 87pieces ,they are meet all your needs in your projects.

【Compact & Portable】It is lightweight and portable (weight:0.375lb,size 5.5 *4.7*0.98inch), all the sewing accessories contained in a high quality zipped case, neat and tidy inside, a looped handle for easy carrying, so you can take it everywhere, no matter who or where you are, having our this emergency sewing kit will always come in handy.

【Great For Traveler】this portable sewing kit is that items are secured by elastic bands to keep everything neatly organized, it especially great for backpackers who travel light and busy professionals who may need to quickly mend a button before a business meeting.the size is easily fitting into most handbags and luggage.

【All In One】: The package includes 18 x Colours Thread Spool,10 x Colored Pearly Sewing Pins,30 x Golden Tail Needles(30 in 1),1 x Measuring Tape ,3 x White shirt buttons,3 x Black shirt buttons,1 x Seam Ripper,5 x Hidden Buttons, 1X Silver Metal Thimble,1 x Scissors,10 x Safety Pins,1 x Sewing Threader,1 x Magnifier glass,1x sweater needle,1 x Black Zipper case

【Ideal Gift】Come with a zipper case, well packaged and full sewing sets, this thread and needle kits very suitable for both beginners and professionals. Great gift for hosewife and adults, mom, grandma, college students, summer camp, home and travel,emergency repairs and more.

【A Must Have】Whether you’re on an out-of-town business trip, have active children who frequently rip their clothes, or have a passion for creative needlework projects, our this thread and needles kits are fantastic little life-savers every household should own.
description: Product Description Sewing Kit Travel Set In our busy lives, minor clothing mishaps like loose threads and missing buttons can be frustrating. With a stylish needle and thread kit, you can effortlessly handle these issues. Made from high-quality materials, this kit is durable and portable, featuring threads in various colors and needles in different sizes. Whether you're at home or on the go, this compact kit will come in handy. It not only meets your immediate needs but also adds elegance to your style.
